text:
[Verse]
Street lights shining bright
City pulse keeps me awake
Neon dreams take flight
In this dance we partake

[Verse 2]
Shadows come alive
Whispering in my ear
Running wild at five
Morning light draws near

[Chorus]
Lost in the night
Lost in the night
Guided by the moon
We take our flight

[Verse 3]
Heartbeat syncs with sound
Bassline carries me
Feet leave the ground
In the night we're free

[Chorus]
Lost in the night
Lost in the night
Guided by the moon
We take our flight

[Bridge]
Time slips away
Dawn a world apart
But here we stay
With untamed hearts
title: Lost in the Night
